item.title: Advent Of Code 2020 | Day 1 - Day 3
item.description: Advent of Code is an Advent calendar of small programming puzzles for a variety of skill sets and skill levels that can be solved in any programming language you like. These are my six solutions to the ‘Advent of Code 2020’ puzzles, from day 1 to day 3, using R.
